review_data.title: Nigerian cuisine
review_data.content: After having been to a movie theater in the Kalkbreite, a part of Zurich, I felt like a small dinner. The area has obviously become quite popular lately, especially with young people, and several eating places have opened up here. On that Friday evening everything...More

review_data.title: Nice Restaurant friendly People
review_data.content: Nigerian rice, plante and beef. What a delicious taste!! The best! Very nice personel, modern African ambiente. Five stars!!

review_data.title: NEVER AGAIN
review_data.content: I got my meal and started eating. After 5 minutes a guy working there came over and tell me that I will have to be quick as the table will be occupied in about 30mn... I left that place right after this and pay my...More

review_data.title: Kulinarische Klimax
review_data.content: Ein echter Gaumenschmaus. Der weltberühmt nigerianische "Jellofrice" begleitet von frittierten Kochbananen mit Fisch war unbeschreiblich köstlich. Der Preis dürfte etwas...More

review_data.title: Naija in Zurich
review_data.content: Nice West Africa restaurant. Warm staff to welcome you. It's simple home (Nigeria) away from home Nice food too.

review_data.title: Wunderbar, geschmackvoll und Bio
review_data.content: Was für eine Perle in Zürich! Leckerstes nigerianisches Essen, vernünftiger Preis und grosse Portionen. Die Überraschung des Jahres!!!

review_data.title: Besser gehts nicht
review_data.content: Service super!, herzlich, freundlich, familIäre Atmosphäre. Grosse Auswahl afrikanische Bier, lecker, richtige Flaschengrösse 0,65l!!!! TIP: Fisch absolut perfekt, Musik toll.

review_data.title: Super Essen
review_data.content: Ich liebe Afrikanisches Essen. Und das Essen ist einfach nur lecker. Das Restaurant ist süss und gemütlich eingerichtet. Wir waren...More

review_data.title: Just great fresh African food
review_data.content: We really enjoy going to this restaurant for West African/Nigerian dishes. Love the fried plantains with tomato sauce and the fish is excellent. Also pounded yams with vegi. Small but tastefully decorated. Never went at lunch, but prices are very reasonable. Try the palmwine, not...More

review_data.title: Great staff, Average food
review_data.content: Classic example of going to a restaurant with high expectations, greeted with great sounding dishes on the menu which turn out to be a damp squib, well most of them. But fantastic serving staff.

review_data.title: Miserable food
review_data.content: Long waiting time, the food (my option was with meat) was very very disgusting. Couldn't eat the meat.

review_data.title: Never again...
review_data.content: My boyfriend and I got full hopes of trying finally something...an ‘African’ restaurant. However, at our arrival we already got disappointed with a very an unfriendly service. The food was not really good.

review_data.title: Einmal und nie wieder

review_data.title: Amazing Food
review_data.content: Though a little spicy but the cuisine is great and worth trying. They can alter the spice level according to your preference and provides an original African cuisine.

review_data.title: Essen dort ist super
review_data.content: Freundliches Personal und schnell im essen machen, Zu empfehlen :Fufu mit Groundnutsoup und RindfleischMore

review_data.title: Amazing Food
review_data.content: Tried African Food for the first time ever and i gotta say i found my new favorite!! The food was so delicious and the service was great as well! I'll definitely come back!

review_data.title: I had Pounded Yam and Ogbono Soup and it was the best ever. Reminded me the way Mummy cooks it.
review_data.content: The ambience is excellent, environment clean and customer service faultless. I had a great time and have not had an experience this good for a long long time. I strongly believe the price is reasonable for the location, quality of food and customer service.

review_data.title: Very good
review_data.content: A very original dinner menu, they can prepare food depending on your level of spicy preference. The service was nice and they explained the menu.

review_data.title: Quality Dishes & Nice Location
review_data.content: The restaurant is located on a very good street in the heart of Zurich and is easily accessible from Zurich HB (main train station) and other parts of the city. We first visited on Monday, May 23, 2016 based on Internet searches. The food was...More

review_data.title: Lunch
review_data.content: Very friendly reception and excellent lunch buffet! We've been out to discover something new and Queen Idia was excellent. Nice and clean guestroom, good food and the Palm Juice (Light Wine) was worth the tasting! See you soon!
